item.title: Contributing
item.description: Contributing to the Adie Hub Check out the repo on github. We are using Hugo to build the site. This means all of the content lives in simple markdown files under the content/post folder! If you just want to correct a typo or add something small to an already existing page, you can skip steps 1, 3, and 4. If you want to add a new page, please follow the steps below:

item.title: C17 Cohort Page
item.description: This is just an example post to show that you can add tags is this happening

item.title: C16 Cohort Page
item.description: Welcome to Cohort 16’s Home Page Seattle [Welcome Guide] (https://drive.google.com/file/d/1m3UeqY7by_DsHHCCivc57lxIBE9SJu24/view?usp=sharing) [Handbook] (https://drive.google.com/file/d/10n0v5GD2HYnzVN-qsNtZrYfDHu0pu9Mf/view?usp=sharing) Digital [Welcome Guide] (https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fHrDvwLEXJ-voWOWw_jVrj2RO7TGtu5P/view?usp=sharing) [Handbook] (https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Z0ksf3v5FWHOVZ_HzW0rGTUBMEOsgo4d/view?usp=sharing) Cohort-Wide [Learn] (https://learn-2.galvanize.com/cohorts/2836) [Curriculum Overview] (https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hnnwlXWeDukWpwEPk8J1zljTxaaraeST/view?usp=sharing) [Social Justice Education Planning Document] (https://drive.google.com/file/d/1P2UKByFLv80GVH5u_9ze8MSsZ1f2huR1/view?usp=sharing) Study Hall link for duration of internship Host Key: 235013 (Someone needs to claim Host in order to create breakout rooms) Recordings [Seattle Auditorium] (https://adaacademy.hosted.panopto.com/Panopto/Pages/Sessions/List.aspx#folderID=%22a0a2eb4e-9c9e-466b-af26-ad920156eefe%22) [Cedar Homeroom] (https://adaacademy.hosted.panopto.com/Panopto/Pages/Sessions/List.aspx#folderID=%22c7daaa8a-b678-40dc-a1ff-ad92015669db%22) [Pine Homeroom] (https://adaacademy.

item.title: About
item.description: An Adie-organized space for sharing resources across adie cohorts. This site is hosted on github pages and the repo can be found at github.com/adie-hub/adie-hub.github.io
